quotes.quote: Your heart is the size of an ocean. Go find yourself in its hidden depths.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The Bay of Bengal is hit frequently by cyclones. The months of November and May, in particular, are dangerous in this regard.
quotes.author: Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: Thinking is the capital, Enterprise is the way, Hard Work is the solution.
quotes.author: Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: If You Can'T Make It Good, At Least Make It Look Good.
quotes.author: Bill Gates
